text: Ndu maaŋ muuŋgip ndu ram muuŋgip ganɨv, khaŋ won kɨvntoga suaŋrie? ‘Ena, ndu khar zɨrim, gu ndu rɨmatugar mba ndigɨna bisaneŋ ndigirga.’ Ndu maaŋ ana nzuai, ndu wora gangi fhuvara, khanararaŋ rumeŋ ndu rɨmatuga ŋkorga ki. Ndu bigi shɨshɨgi guma ma. Ndu fharav wo rɨmatugar mba khanararaŋ rumeŋ ndigɨri. Ndu ne ndigɨp, ndu nzerara ganɨv, ndu won kɨvntoga rɨmatuga mba ndigɨna bisaneŋ ndigɨrga.”
